relationship_to_primary.primary_manuscript_title: The Plenum-to-Particle Loop Sequence of Field Structure Theory (FST)
relationship_to_primary.non_drift_rule: Companion must preserve the same core narrative: non-local plenum -> loop condensation -> STF mapping -> ratio correspondence to measured particle mass ratios; avoid introducing new ontologies that contradict this framing.

mirrored_claims_lock.claim: Particle formation as condensation of action from a non-local, isometric plenum into loop structures.
refs: Paper Summary: foundational medium—the Plenum—consists of continuous action loops
Cover Letter: action condenses from non-local background isometric looped Plenum

mirrored_claims_lock.claim: Mapping loop counts onto the Sierpinski Triangle Fractal (STF) yields ratio correspondence to experimentally measured particle mass ratios in electron volts.
refs: Paper Summary: loop counts corresponding directly to measured particle masses and ratios
Cover Letter: ratios between iterations of the STF are the same ratios as those found between particles measured in electron volts

mirrored_claims_lock.claim: Two complementary loop types (Rspin/Aspin) coexist; observability requires boundary intersection; cloaking occurs when condensed loopage encloses deployed loopage.
refs: Paper Summary: CCW Rspin loops (anti-matter) and CW Aspin loops (real-matter) always coexist
Paper Summary: Cloaking occurs when condensed Aspin loopage fully encloses deployed Rspin

mirrored_claims_lock.claim: Scale invariance and quantitative consistency; macroscale loop models reveal principles persisting across scales.
refs: Paper Summary: Structural Physics is shown to be scale-invariant and quantitatively consistent

mirrored_claims_lock.claim: Original/unpublished and not under consideration elsewhere (submission posture).
refs: Cover Letter: original manuscript not published elsewhere and is not being considered by another publisher

what_we_add: QA formalization layer: explicit state packet, generator set, invariants, obstruction types, and deterministic validator contracts.
Machine-checkable certificates for key quantitative claims (ratio test, lambda bookkeeping, stability delta_sym witness).
Failure algebra: when/why a claim fails (SOURCE_NUMERIC_DRIFT, SYMMETRY_DEFECT, NOT_IN_STF_BASIS, CLOAKED_FROM_OBSERVER).
what_we_do_not_add: New physical claims that compete with or contradict SP/FST's narrative.
Speculative additions (e.g., unrelated cosmology) not implied by the submission framing.

certificate_plan.basis: Quasi-superimposability witness: proton hexagon has two extra triangles on three of six sides; stability tied to superimposability.
Up/Down ratio equality (MeV vs loops) + lambda decay bookkeeping (2187-243-81-27=1836).
refs: FST mapping: u/d quark ratio comparison
FST mapping: lambda 2187 loops decay bookkeeping

cover_letter_alignment_points: STF mapping and ratio correspondence line.
